data.name: XB without XF
data.description: Table XB is the Logistic Support Analysis (LSA) Control Number. Table XF is the System / End Item Serial Number. This query identifies where a record exists in table XB but no child record exists in table XF for the same LSACONXB & ALTLCNXB.

data.name: HG without HO
data.description: Tables HG is the Part Application Provisioning. Table HO is the Provisioning System / End Item Usable On Code. This query identifies where a record exists in table HG but no child record exists in table HO for the same LSACONXB, ALTLCNXB, CAGECDXH & REFNUMHA.

data.name: H task without replacement spare
data.description: This query identifies where there is a record in table CA with a TASKCDCA starting 'H' but no child record exists in table CI for the same LSACONXB & ALTLCNXB.

data.name: XB without TXB
data.description: This query identifies where a record exists in table XB but no child record exists in table TXB for the same LSACONXB & ALTLCNXB.

data.name: TXB without TREV STATUS
data.description: This query identifies where a record exists in table TXB but no child record exists in table TREVSTATUS for the same LSACONXB & ALTLCNXB.

data.name: CA without TCA
data.description: This query identifies where a record exists in table CA but no child record exists in table CA for the same LSACONXB, ALTLCNXB & TASKCDCA.

data.name: TCA without TSOURCE
data.description: This query identifies where a record exists in table TCA but no child record exists in table TSOURCE for the same LSACONXB, ALTLCNXB & TASKCDCA.

data.name: HG without SMRCODHG
data.description: Source Maintenance and Recoverability (SMR) code. 1st & 2nd position Source code. 3rd and 4th position: Maintenance Code. 5th position: Recoverability Code. 6th position: Allocated by individual. This query identifies where a record exists in table HG but the SMRCODHG is not populated.

data.name: SMRCODHG - ICC mismatch
data.description: Item Category Code (ICC). This query identifies where a record exists in table HG but the 4th & 5th characters of the SMRCODHG (DED 389) do not align with the ITMCATHG.

data.name: SMRCODHG - CA mismatch
data.description: This query identifies where a record exists in table CA but the 3rd character of the TASKCDCA i.e. the maintenance level does not align with the 4th & 5th characters of the SMRCODHG.

data.name: Same PNR different Cage
data.description: Part Number Record (PNR). Cage Code. This query identifies where a record exists in table HA where the REFNUMHA is identical but the CAGECDXH codes differ.

data.name: Same NSN different PNR
data.description: Nato Stock Number (NSN). Part Number Record (PNR). This query identifies where a record exists in table HA where the NSN is identical but the REFNUMHA codes differ.

data.name: HB same PNR as HA
data.description: Table HB is the Additional Reference Number. Table HA is the Item Identification. This query identifies where a record exists in table HA but the child record in HB has the same REFNUMHA.

data.name: Scheduled Task without BH
data.description: Table BH is the Failure Mode Task. This query identifies where a record exists in table CA where the 2nd character of the TASKCDCA indicates a scheduled task but no child record exists in table BH for the same LSACONXB, ALTLCNXB & TASKCDCA.

data.name: BD without FR Data Source in BA
data.description: Table BD is the AR&M Indicator Characteristics. Table BA is the AR&M Characteristics. Failure Rate (FR). This query identifies where a record exists in table BD and the TEMTBFBD is populated but in table BA the FRDATABA is not populated for the same LSACONXB & ALTLCNXB.

data.name: CA without Predicted Times
data.description: Table CA is the Task Requirement. This query identifies where there is a record in table CA but the PREDMETCA & PRDMMHCA fields have not been populated.

data.name: CA without AOR
data.description: Table CA is the Task Requirement. Annual Operating Requirement (AOR). This query identifies where there is a record in table CA but the AORlCNCA, AORALCCA, AORTYPCA & AORMSBCA fields have not been populated.

data.name: Task ID - Task code mismatch
data.description: This query identifies where there is a record in table CA but the 1st character of the TASKCDCA does not align with the first word/s of the TASKIDCA.

data.name: BH Task type - Freq MB mismatch
data.description: Table BH is Failure Mode Task. MB is Measurement Base. This task identifies where there is a record in table BH but the TATYPEBH does not align with the MAINMBBH.

data.name: BH - CA Freq MB mismatch
data.description: Table BH is Failure Mode Task. Table CA is the Task Requirement. MB is Measurement Base. This task identifies where there is a record in table CA and a child record in table BH but the AORMSBCA & MAINMBBH are different for the same LSACONXB, ALTLCNXB & TASKCDCA.

data.name: BH Freq missing
data.description: Table BH is Failure Mode Task. This query identifies where there is a record in table BH but the MAININBH & MAINMBBH fields have not been populated.

data.name: HA Item name missing
data.description: Table HA is the Item Identification. This query identifies where there is a record in table HA but the ITNAMEHA field has not been populated.

data.name: RAM indicator without BA
data.description: Table BD is the AR&M Indicator Characteristics. Table BA is the AR&M Characteristics. RAM Indicator within the XB table. This query identifies where there is a record in table XB and the RAMINDXB is 'Y' but there is no child BA record for the same LSACONXB & ALTLCNXB.

data.name: Parent LCN missing
data.description: This query identifies where there is a record in table XB but there is no parent XB record in the LCN structure.

data.name: Incorrect LCN indenture Code
data.description: Table XB is the LCN Indentured Item. This task identifies where there is a record in table XB but the LCNINDXB field does not align with the length of the LSACONXB.

data.name: Task Code Interval - BH Freq Mismatch
data.description: This task identifies where there is a record in table CA and a child record in table BH for the same LSACONXB, ALTLCNXB & TASKCDCA. The 2nd character of the TASKCDCA in table CA does not align with the MAININBH & MAINMBBH fields IN table BH.

ca_task_code_vs_hg_smr_code.label: CA - Task Code vs HG - SMR Code
